OOC:Hey everyone I am back, yea you can stop cheering now, really 
(pss don't stop keep cheering) no really stop oh thank you.  Ok i 
know jer just posted for my guys but i want to post so bad right now 
here i go....

BIC:

Havotron looked back to the scanners then to optic enhancer screen.  
Through it he could see a void in space as stars seemes to 
dissapear. "What Autobot trick is this" he screamed beggining to get 
annoyed with his crews fright.  He looked to the 
Contructicons. "Scrapper, what do you have on this ship. I want those 
Autobots out of the air immediatly"  Havotron began to feel his power 
of command. Yes he liked it.  He looked to his best man Spinister 
calmly at the window. Then to the cowering Needlenos hanging on to 
the wall beside Spinister. "Spinister, get the crew into thier ranks 
and prepare for emergency battle. Needlenose, you...jsut follow him"  
Havotron turned once again looking to the screen in front of him.  'I 
know what this is' he htought to himself. 'It is the Pit itself, and 
the Autobots will finally melt in it.'

Scrapper acknowledged Havotron to scared to say 
anything.  "Constucticons" he muttered out "Get to you stations and 
wiat to fire."  He walked to a planning board.

On the Hidden One:
JetV ran out of hte control room looking back only once to his 
commander sitting there weakly.  He then ran to the storage area 
quickly. He wasn't sure but he could swear he heard a pounding on 
sound. "Must be the fate outside that teases me with sounds" he said 
to himself.

Crotale continued to pound on the door.  Small dents began to show 
through the metal. Someone must notice them soon.  

Slag looked to the pityful Autobots all cowering except the 
Dinobots. "Pathetic two strokes.  Grimlock show courage, and so do 
rest of Dinobots.

> The Constructicon ship begins to slowly enter the shifting space. 
On the

Hook
> down, the lights go out, his red shimmering smoke lighting up a 
small
> area. Scrapper begins to panik, "Lord Unitron, we are being drawn 
into a
> dangerous predicament, I suggest we pull out, and call it quits."
> Scrapper sputtered.
> 
> Havotron's eyes flared. It must be an Autobot trick. "NO, we follow
> them. I want to know what they're after." Just then though, the ship
> began to sputter, as it was gaining speed being sucked in. 
Slugslinger
> and Apeface's eyes were begining to cloud over, as they were losing
> balance. Havotron looked around at the other Decepticons. "Wimps, 
stand
> up." He shouted.
> 
> Scrapper got out of his seat. "My lord, we could be ripped to 
shreds if
> we continue." 
> 
> At those words Havotron leveled his cannon at Scrapper. "Get back to
> your seat." he said quietly to dot the exclamation on his point.
> 
> Spinister could only look on through the window. He had never seen
> anything like it.
>

> Hidden One::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
> He had never seen anything like it. It was so beautiful, Lightspeed
> could not take his eyes away from it. Strafe began to feel light 
headed,
> and leaned on Afterburner.
> 
> Hoist looked at Pacifix, "Are you all right commander?" He asked
> worriedly.
> 
> Grimlock looked over and noticed Pacifix. Something was going 
wrong, he
> could see some of the other Autobots get clumsy. Why wasn't Pacifix
> telling them anything. He stood up, and headed towards the back.
